name: f7-welcomescreen
description: This Framework7 plugin will guide the user through a tour of your app.

scripts.build: yarn clean && mkdir dist && babel index.js --out-file dist/f7-welcomescreen.min.js && css-minify -f styles.css -o dist && mv dist/styles.min.css dist/f7-welcomescreen.min.css

author: Timo Ernst
